:name: sequence_goto_repetition_test
:description: sequence with goto repetition operator test
:tags: 16.9
:unsynthesizable: 1

module top();

logic clk;
logic a;
logic b;

sequence seq;
    @(posedge clk) b ##1 a [->2:10] ##1 b;
endsequence

assert property (seq);

endmodule
